snippet: Officials fear that some soccer fans will carry dengue fever, now an epidemic in Brazil, back to their home countries.
abstract: Some public health officials fear that visitors to World Cup soccer match in Brazil, which is suffering world's worst epidemic of dengue fever, will carry virus back to their home countries.
lead_paragraph: Officials fear that some soccer fans will carry dengue fever, now an epidemic in Brazil, back to their home countries.

headline.main: With World Cup in Brazil, Risk of Spreading a Virus
headline.print_headline: With World Cup in Brazil, Risk of Spreading a Virus
